title: Space-Farm Biodome Adventure #69
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Biodome Control Room
rooms.description: A compact control room with flickering monitors displaying plant growth data and atmospheric readings. Warning lights blink red across the main console. Through the reinforced window, you see rows of hydroponic crops stretching into the distance. The air smells of recycled oxygen and ozone.

items.name: main control console
items.description: A complex array of switches, screens, and indicator lights monitoring the biodome systems

items.name: maintenance logbook
items.description: A digital tablet showing recent maintenance records
items.text: MAINTENANCE LOG: System initialized 2157. Chief Engineer Rodriguez oversees all operations. Emergency protocol: Access code is the year of initialization. Remember: crops are stored in the Hydroponics Bay, and the shuttle is in the Emergency Dock.

items.name: emergency supply cabinet
items.description: A metal cabinet with three compartments labeled for different emergency supplies

items.name: engineer's note
items.description: A handwritten note on official station letterhead
items.text: Note from Chief Engineer Rodriguez: If you're reading this, something has gone wrong. The biodome entrance requires your keycard. The shuttle bay needs proper authorization. Stay calm and follow protocols.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard with Chief Engineer Rodriguez's name printed on it

items.name: tool storage rack
items.description: A wall-mounted rack holding various maintenance tools

items.name: multipurpose utility tool
items.description: A versatile tool with multiple attachments for repairs and maintenance

items.name: biodome entrance door
items.description: A sealed airlock door leading into the main biodome growing area. A card reader blinks beside it.

rooms.name: Hydroponics Bay
rooms.description: A vast chamber filled with vertical growing towers and nutrient mist. LED grow lights cast a purple glow over rows of lettuce, tomatoes, and wheat. The sound of water pumps and air circulators fills the space. A storage locker stands against the far wall, and information panels describe the various crops.

items.name: lettuce information panel
items.description: A digital display showing data about the lettuce crop
items.text: CROP: Hydroponic Lettuce - Primary food source for station crew. Grown in nutrient solution. Harvest cycle: 30 days.

items.name: tomato information panel
items.description: A screen displaying tomato growing information
items.text: CROP: Cherry Tomatoes - Vitamin C source. Requires careful pH monitoring. Chief Rodriguez personally tends these plants.

items.name: wheat information panel
items.description: A monitor showing wheat cultivation data
items.text: CROP: Dwarf Wheat - Grain production for bread and pasta. Experimental strain developed in 2157. Stored in the Hydroponics Bay after harvest.

items.name: agricultural storage locker
items.description: A large locker containing farming supplies and equipment

items.name: shuttle authorization document
items.description: An official document with emergency evacuation protocols
items.text: EMERGENCY SHUTTLE AUTHORIZATION: In case of biodome failure, proceed to Emergency Dock. Security verification required: Who is the chief engineer? Where are crops stored? What year was the system initialized?

items.name: emergency oxygen canister
items.description: A portable oxygen supply for emergency situations

items.name: vertical growing tower
items.description: A tall hydroponic tower with multiple plant levels

items.name: hidden message
items.description: A small note tucked behind a plant tray
items.text: Personal log: This biodome has been my life's work since 2157. If evacuation is necessary, remember that proper authorization is required. The answers are in the maintenance records and crop data. - Rodriguez

items.name: emergency shuttle bay door
items.description: A reinforced door leading to the shuttle bay. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

password_questions.question: Who is the chief engineer?
password_questions.hint: Check the maintenance log and various notes throughout the biodome

password_questions.question: Where are crops stored?
password_questions.hint: Look at the crop information panels and maintenance records

password_questions.question: What year was the system initialized?
password_questions.hint: The maintenance log contains this information

rooms.name: Emergency Shuttle Bay
rooms.description: You've reached the emergency shuttle bay! A sleek escape shuttle sits on the launch pad, its engines humming with standby power. Through the bay windows, you can see the stars and the curve of the planet below. The shuttle's hatch is open, inviting you to safety.

items.name: emergency escape shuttle
items.description: A compact spacecraft designed for emergency evacuation, fully fueled and ready for launch

items.name: shuttle launch console
items.description: The control panel for initiating shuttle departure, all systems showing green

items.name: observation viewport
items.description: A large window showing the beauty of space and the planet below

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You board the emergency shuttle and initiate the launch sequence. The engines roar to life as the biodome falls away behind you. You've successfully escaped the failing space farm and are heading to safety. The crops may be lost, but you survived to farm another day. You win!
